title: Can't post anything on other boards but I already am level 6!

replies.body: An account may need to sync up with the boards when posting for the first time, and usually a post or upvote will do the trick.  It looks like you're updated and should be able to post not.  Have fun!
I had the same problem when I tried to report something, but when I post my report on Help & Support the problem was gone.
